Product Title: The real green Jade roller facial massager for anti aging and anti wrinkle and under eye bags for women and men & lymphatic drainage chi roller neck healing nephrite roller chi roller
Review Date: 2018/07/20
Store: iSee Products
Product Description: ['Jade Stone Facial massager has been used for over 1,400 years in the Ancient Chinese Dynasty era. The Chi Roller is known for its healing and revitalizing properties. Providing lymphatic drainage and anti aging and anti wrinkle solutions. The use of the jade stone roller improves chi circulation by stimulating meridian points. This is the perfect beauty preservation tool. We want you to glow and command compliments with your natural skin. Our Double Jade Facial rollers are made with quality and care. - Double Jade roller can be placed in the freezer to attack those eye bags and puffiness. Keep tone and tight - Made with 100% natural jade with all the (Ancient Chinese) healing properties. Used for neck massager and neck slimming tool-The right ideal hand size with a roller on both sides -Lifetime warranty If you are not satisfied return to us for a full refund. If you do not love the roller well buy it back from you. -Please note due to nature of the jade stone each piece can vary in color from pale to very dark to translucent. Please take care of the roller as each is handmade and somewhat delicate. -We recommend using gentle pressure on skin.']
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '9.61 x 4.88 x 0.94 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '719104782803', 'Manufacturer': 'iSee Products'}

prompt:

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    Remember to:
    - Focus only on keywords and  trends supported by multiple interactions
    - Avoid repeating specific product names or details

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The purchase history indicates a preference for skincare and beauty products, particularly those targeting anti-aging and wrinkle reduction. Consistently high ratings (5.0) are given to effective products that meet these aesthetic goals, suggesting a strong appreciation for efficacy in skincare. However, there are notable adverse reactions associated with some eye creams, indicating sensitivity and a low tolerance for certain ingredients. 

The user appears to favor creams and oils that are multi-functional, as seen in their usage of specific products on both the face and hands. The presence of negative experiences with eye creams suggests a careful approach is required when selecting products for sensitive areas, reflecting a potential allergy or intolerance.

In terms of quality, the user seems to value longevity and scent in fragrance products, evidenced by positive feedback on a body oil that lasts long and smells pleasant. Price sensitivity appears moderate, with reviews reflecting both satisfaction and frustration regarding value for money, particularly in instances of poor product performance.

Overall, core preferences include a strong inclination toward products that deliver visible results for aging skin, while avoiding harsh or poorly formulated items, as well as a balance between affordability and quality in product selection.

target_interaction.title: The band around the head is too small. Not enough stretch.
target_interaction.text: I have a little peanut head and this is too small. Please make them small, medium and large. Everyone doesn't have the same size head. Thanks.
target_interaction.title_meta: 2 Pieces Soft Sleep Cap – Night Satin Bonnet with Wide Premium Elastic Band for Women
